# EntityIsHiddenWhenInvisibleComponent Class (Version 1.x.x)

> [!IMPORTANT]
> This documentation is for an older version of this module. Go to the latest documentation [*here*](../../../scriptapi/minecraft/server/EntityIsHiddenWhenInvisibleComponent.md).

## Extends
- [*EntityComponent*](EntityComponent.md)

When added, this component signifies that this entity can hide from hostile mobs while invisible.

## Constants

### **componentId**
`static read-only componentId = "minecraft:is_hidden_when_invisible";`

Type: *string*
